body: What do you mean, the NTR is simply the Tomboy now corrupted stupidly trying to do it to the POV protagonist who corrupted her! The only sad is she finds out late, but only despairs at getting played and her life ruined for like "a second" before she focuses more on the sex as the POV makes mention of her only being shocked for a bit before going to fuck again (likely figuring in those seconds it's too late and she no longer cares as long as she gets fucked) as he takes note of the next "high minded bitch" like Tomboy he'll bring down into a slutty bitch with no future once she's used up (as he loves corrupting Good Girls with bright futures into THOTs with low brain power and willingly ruin their good futures and prospects in a having fun for once gone wrong as they have no self control and drugs make it worse! It's Dr. Psycho from Wonder Woman's wet dream" genre LOL)
believe me, this becomes a very sad NTR :(
